title: Refund Credit for 5 Hextech Chests?
body: Hey Just wondering should i use a refund credit to purchase 5 Hextech Chests And Keys? Or do you guys think i shouldnt.

replies.body: Up to you. Chests are a gamble so choose carefully.
No its not. Crafting system is more for fun then trying to get "expensive skins for cheap". Just fun lucky dip.
I got chests, wasn't worth the rp. its like gambling, you win some, you lose more
